cartodb.sqlQueryCountCameras: SELECT cameras.*, COUNT(items.*) as count FROM ${CAMERAS} AS cameras LEFT JOIN (SELECT goSub.camera, goSub.location, goSub.month, goSub.year, goSub.season, goSub.time_period, goCla.species, goCla.species_count, goCla.user_hash, goSub.subject_id, goCla.classification_id FROM ${SUBJECTS} AS goSub INNER JOIN ${CLASSIFICATIONS} AS goCla ON goSub.subject_id = goCla.subject_zooniverse_id ${WHERE} ) AS items ON cameras.id = items.camera GROUP BY cameras.cartodb_id
